long_description: Dressed for the office, but well equipped for the trail, the Mountain Hardwear Enterprise daypack combines a supportive suspension with a clean, functional design and lots of convenient organization. Large main compartment features fully padded 15 in. laptop sleeve and internal soft fleece pocket for sunglasses. Front organization pocket contains a sleeve to hold your tablet, plus zippered and mesh organizer pockets. Two zippered pockets on front panel offer additional storage and organization. Deep side pockets provide easy access to water bottles or power cords. Lightweight and strong framesheet is shaped to match the curve of your back so the load remains stable and well balanced. Streamlined shoulder straps and fully padded back panel feature fast-wicking air mesh and strategically placed venting channels to keep you cooler. Adjustable sternum strap and tuck-away webbing waistbelt add stability while on the move; side compression straps provide load control. Mountain Hardwear Enterprise daypack has both a front padded grab handle and top webbing handle. Tough 210-denier HexRip nylon body panels combine with a rugged 840-denier nylon bottom and fully bound seams to ensure durability and long life.
short_description: Dressed for the office, but well equipped for the trail, the Mountain Hardwear Enterprise daypack combines a supportive suspension with a clean, functional design and lots of convenient organization.
